scripts.build4netlify: parcel build ./src/index.html && parcel build ./src/index.html --dist-dir ./dist/auth/ --public-url ./ && parcel build ./src/index.html --dist-dir ./dist/reg/ --public-url ./ && parcel build ./src/index.html --dist-dir ./dist/chats/ --public-url ./ && parcel build ./src/index.html --dist-dir ./dist/error404/ --public-url ./ && parcel build ./src/index.html --dist-dir ./dist/error500/ --public-url ./
